creditline: The Donald McNeely Family Fund in tribute to Marjorie McNeely, the Friends of Bruce Dayton Art Acquisition Fund, and funds from an anonymous endowment in honor of Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: seated man wearing a green robe with yellow trim, white belt, and turquoise colored necklace, with a cap of curving design tied under his chin; man has his PL hand on his knee and his PR hand held palm out with his thumb touching his second finger; man seated on a raised green and yellow platform; lower portion of platform is separate ceramic piece
title: Figure of the Daoist Deity Tianzun
